description: Stove + Pot: enables cooking/hot drinks at camp
Stove + Fuel: each fuel canister increases stove usefulness
Tent + Sleeping bag improve shelter comfort
GPS and Map/Compass partially substitute each other
Electrolytes increase effective value of water in heat
Food requires bear canister where mandated
Rain jacket + Sunscreen on sunny/rain-mix days
Puffy + Emergency blanket for cold snaps
Poles + Microspikes on steep/icy alpine routes
